entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
